tag.title: worker image tag, defaults to Chart appVersion

resources.title: default resource limits and requests configuration for the Corda containers

limits.title: the default CPU/memory resource limits for the Corda containers

requests.title: the default CPU/memory resource request for the Corda containers

scrape.title: enable scraping of worker metrics through Prometheus annotations

dumpHostPath.title: path on Kubernetes hosts to mount on Corda workers for collecting dumps

heapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError.title: enables capturing JVM heap dumps from Corda workers on an OutOfMemory error

nodeSelector.title: node labels for pod assignment, see https://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/node-selection/

serviceAccount.title: service account for pod assignment, see https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/configure-service-account/

database.title: the name of the cluster database

bootstrapServers.title: comma-separated list of Kafka bootstrap servers

topicPrefix.title: prefix to use for Kafka topic names (to support the use of a single Kafka cluster by multiple Corda clusters)

tls.title: tls configuration for client connections to Kafka

enabled.title: indicates whether TLS should be used for client connections to Kafka

truststore.title: if TLS is enabled, the truststore configuration for client connections to Kafka

type.title: if TLS is enabled, the type of the truststore for client connections to Kafka; one of PEM or JKS

sasl.title: SASL configuration for client connection to Kafka

enabled.title: enable/disable SASL for client connection to Kafka

mechanism.title: SASL mechanism for client connection to Kafka

initialAdminUser.title: configuration for the initial user created with admin permissions

enabled.title: indicates whether DB bootstrap is enabled as part of installation

dbConnectionPool.title: JDBC connection pool configuration for crypto DB

maxSize.title: maximum JDBC connection pool size for crypto DB

dbConnectionPool.title: JDBC connection pool configuration for RBAC DB

maxSize.title: maximum JDBC connection pool size for RBAC DB

registry.title: registry for image containing a db client, used to set up the db

repository.title: repository for image containing a db client, used to set up the db

tag.title: tag for image containing a db client, used to set up the db

enabled.title: indicates whether Kafka bootstrap is enabled as part of installation

cleanup.title: specifies whether existing topics with the given prefix should be deleted before trying to create new ones (deletes all existing topics if no prefix is given)

image.title: configuration for CLI image used for bootstrap

registry.title: CLI image registry; defaults to image.registry

tag.title: CLI default tag; defaults to image.tag

resources.title: resource limits and requests configuration for the bootstrap containers

requests.title: the CPU/memory resource requests for the bootstrap containers

limits.title: the CPU/memory resource limits for the bootstrap containers

nodeSelector.title: node selector for the bootstrap containers

serviceAccount.title: service account for the bootstrap containers

enabled.title: Enables RBAC roles bootstrapping as part of installation

clusterDbConnectionPool.title: crypto worker JDBC connection pool configuration for cluster DB

maxSize.title: crypto worker maximum JDBC connection pool size for cluster DB

clusterDbConnectionPool.title: DB worker JDBC connection pool configuration for cluster DB

maxSize.title: DB worker maximum JDBC connection pool size for cluster DB

verifyInstrumentation.title: run flow worker with Quasar's verifyInstrumentation enabled

type.title: the type for the RPC worker service

externalTrafficPolicy.title: the traffic policy for the RPC worker service

loadBalancerSourceRanges.title: the LoadBalancer source ranges to limit access to the RPC worker service

annotations.title: the annotations for RPC worker service

registry.title: worker image registry, defaults to image.registry

tag.title: worker image tag, defaults to image.tag

suspend.title: if debug is enabled, suspend the worker until the debugger is attached

level.title: log level (defaults to logging.level if not specified)

resources.title: resource limits and requests configuration for the worker containers.

requests.title: the CPU/memory resource requests for the worker containers

limits.title: the CPU/memory resource limits for the worker containers

config.title: configuration for which a value may be provided inline or via a secret

valueFrom.title: an alternative location for the value

secretKeyRef.title: a reference to a value in a secret

key.title: the key in the secret corresponding to the required value
